Project page

This plugin provided client side internationalisation support for websites.

Author

Version

1.0 stable

Classes

Lang

extends $.Tools.class

This plugin holds all needed methods to extend a website for internationalisation.

Instance Methods

initialize(options, @currentLanguage, @knownLanguage, @_$domNodeToFade, @_numberOfFadedDomNodes, @_replacements, @_textNodesWithKnownLanguage)

Initializes the plugin. Current language is set and later needed dom nodes are grabbed.

options {Object} - An options object.

returns {$.Lang} - Returns the current instance.

switch(language, ensure)

Switches the current language to given language. This method is mutual synchronized.

language {String|Boolean} - New language as string or "true". If set to "true" it indicates that the dom tree should be checked again current language to ensure every text node has right content.

ensure {Boolean} - Indicates if a switch effect should be avoided.

returns {$.Lang} - Returns the current instance.

refresh()

Ensures current selected language.

returns {$.Lang} - Returns the current instance.

Functions

$.Lang()
